biocontainers.name: ataqv
biocontainers.summary: ataqv is a toolkit for measuring and comparing ATAC-seq results. It was written to help understand how well ATAC-seq assays have worked, and to make it easier to spot differences that might be caused by library prep or sequencing.

biotools.summary: A toolkit for measuring and comparing ATAC-seq results.

bioschemas.name: ataqv
bioschemas.summary: A toolkit for measuring and comparing ATAC-seq results.
